item.title: Italy says Paragon spyware targeted victims in dozens of European countries
item.description:
Seven Italians and victims in more than a dozen other European countries were targeted with spyware as part of a broad hacking campaign revealed by WhatsApp on Friday, the Italian government said.

item.title: Texas utility firm investigating potential leak of customer data tied to 2023 MOVEit breach
item.description:
A large Texas energy company confirmed it is investigating reports of stolen customer data that has been published on a cybercriminal forum after it was allegedly taken during a 2023 breach.

item.title: Hackers impersonate Ukraine’s CERT to trick people into allowing computer access
item.description:
CERT-UA is warning Ukrainians not to accept requests for help via AnyDesk software unless they are sure the source is legitimate.

item.title: Russian ransomware hackers increasingly posing as tech support on Microsoft Teams
item.description:
Researchers at Sophos say they have seen more than 15 incidents in which two separate groups used Microsoft Office 365’s default service settings to socially engineer their way onto a victim’s system.
